name: mentionbot
description: Get mentioned when certain phrases (such as your name) appear in Discord messages

DATABASE_URL.description: Postgres connection url. Don't set to use the provisioned Heroku Postgres

CLIENT_ID.description: Discord bot client. Get one at https://discordapp.com/developers/applications/me/create

TOKEN.description: Discord bot token. Get one at https://discordapp.com/developers/applications/me/create

SENTRY_DSN.description: Sentry reporting URL. Get one at https://sentry.io
